sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个词均有"金的"之意。
means: gold ： 指真金制造的东西，侧重指材料，但有时也作"金色的"解。
golden ： 指镀金的或金色的，多用于比喻。

word_mean: 金：一种黄色金属元素，在岩石中呈团块或岩层状，在河沙中呈颗粒状，其化学符号为Au(aurum)，原子序数79，原子量196.967，比重19.32。合铸时纯度单位以开表示，纯金为24开(karat或carat)。金化合物用于治疗，主要为关节炎，所有金化合物均有毒性

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch goud and German Gold, from an Indo-European root shared by yellow

entry.def: Gold is a valuable, yellow-coloured metal that is used for making jewellery and ornaments, and as an international currency.

example.tran: 镶嵌在黄金上的蓝宝石

example.ex: The price of gold was going up.

entry.def: Gold is jewellery and other things that are made of gold.

example.ex: We handed over all our gold and money.
example.tran: 我们将所有的金首饰和钱都交了出来。

entry.def: Something that is gold is a bright yellow colour, and is often shiny.

example.ex: I'd been wearing Michel's black and gold shirt.
example.tran: 我一直都穿着米歇尔那件黑色和金色相间的衬衫。

entry.def: A  gold is the same as a gold medal .

example.ex: His ambition was to win gold at the Atlanta Games in 1996...
example.tran: 他的志向是在1996年亚特兰大奥运会上夺取金牌。

example.ex: This Saturday the British star is going for gold in the Winter Olympics.
example.tran: 本周六，这位英国明星将向冬奥会的金牌发起冲击。

entry.def: If you say that a child is being as good as gold, you are emphasizing that they are behaving very well and are not causing you any problems.

example.ex: The boys were as good as gold on our walk.
example.tran: 我们散步的时候，这帮小男孩表现得很乖。

entry.tran: 一颗金子般的心；赤子之心
entry.def: If you say that someone has a heart of gold, you are emphasizing that they are very good and kind to other people.

example.ex: They are all good boys with hearts of gold. They would never steal.
example.tran: 他们都是有着金子般心灵的好孩子，绝不会干偷摸扒窃之事。

entry.tran: 期望得到的一大笔钱，未来的一桶金（英国英语中亦作a crock of gold）
entry.def: Money that someone hopes they will get in the future is sometimes referred to as a pot of gold. Also a crock of gold, mainly in British English.

example.ex: I would rather be honest with people than tell them that there is going to be some pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.
example.tran: 我宁肯实话实说也不愿意给予他们不切实际的期望。

sentences.sentence: "he admired the gold of her hair"

means.word_mean: 3. a soft yellow malleable ductile (trivalent and univalent) metallic element; occurs mainly as nuggets in rocks and alluvial deposits; does not react with most chemicals but is attacked by chlorine and aqua regia

sentences.sentence: "Whilst that for which all virtue now is sold, and almost every vice--almighty gold"--Ben Jonson

means.word_mean: 5. something likened to the metal in brightness or preciousness or superiority etc.;

sentences.sentence: "the child was as good as gold"

means.word_mean: 1. made from or covered with gold;
2. having the deep slightly brownish color of gold;

auth_sentence.content: This was a gold medal sealed in novel fashion.

Sentence.sentence: In a study of older people with sisters and brothers, psychologist Debra Gold of the Duke Center for the study of aging and human development found that about 20% said they were hostile or indifferent to ward their sisters and brothers.

A man who had recently reconciled with his brother told Gold there's something that lets older people to put aside bad deeds of the past and focus a little on what we need now, especially when it's sisters and brothers
What does the study by Debra Gold find about older people?

sentences.en: Gold is found in rocks and streams.
sentences.cn: 黄金蕴藏在岩石与溪流中。

sentences.en: People used to pay in gold.
sentences.cn: 以前人们常用金币交易。

sentences.en: I love the brown and gold of autumn leaves.
Some gold coins were dug out from the ground.
sentences.cn: 几枚金币从地下挖了出来。

sentences.en: Winning an Olympic gold medal was, I suppose, the supreme moment of my life.
sentences.cn: 我认为荣获奥运金牌是我一生中最重要的时刻。

sentences.en: Join the blue wool onto the end of the gold pattern and work the same stitches into the back.
sentences.cn: 在这金色图案边缘织上蓝毛线, 在背面也用同样的方法来织。

jushi.english: The chinese team won a gold and two silver at the races today.
jushi.chinese: 今天的赛事中中国队获得了一块金牌两块银牌。

jushi.english: For over 100 years, men have sought for gold in the hills.
jushi.chinese: 一百多年以来人们一直在山中寻找黄金。

jushi.english: She has a heart of gold.
